reviews.sentence: I was guaranteed an early check in by both Niko and Expedia. I was refused early check in unles I upgraded my room to a more expensive room.

Great place to stay. Very central easy access to bus tours and tram. Near Macys and Westfield both walkable for shopping. Nice room and amenities. Staff were very friendly and helpful. We were greeted by pleasant staff. On arrival our room was upgraded free of charge. The room was clean and comfortable with a nice clean bathroom. The room service is on the pricey side. The hotel is very central for both sightseeing tours and shopping. My only complaint was the big bus tour ticket sold to us by the concierge. This was 55 but outside in union square there are a number of bus companies and you can negotiate a lower price for the same tour.
Lovely stay. Food and service. Room felt older.

Beautiful Bathroom. The best things about the Hotel Niko are the location and the beautiful bathrooms. The view was nice too. The bathrooms were gorgeous with a huge tub and removable shower heads. It was all marble with a raised sink too. It felt like the spa. The room itself was decent and the beds were comfortable. It was so nice being able to walk outside the hotel and go to Starbucks tons of restaurants and shopping. We were with our children so they enjoyed the pool and hot tub although it did have a funky smell to it. We would stay here again.

Pleasant. close to union square comfy beds very friendly doormen and parking valet. Very expensive for what it has to offer. There was dust in my room on the lamp and in the bathroom. Parking is very expensive. Taxes are also much more expensive than in other hotels. So it means lots of hidden charges. When I asked the concierge to take back my car he told me that he called the valet but it was untrue. I waited 15 minutes for nothing. The receptionist at the front desk was not really pleasant.

please please please do not be foolish enough to stop in this hotel we arrived at the hotel at 230 pm after a 6 hour drive cross country we requested an early check in. so as we only arrived 30 mins early we did nt expect any problems. we were wrong we were told to come back at 3 as the room was nt readyi said its fine we will have a drink and wait were is the bar oh sorry sir the bar is closed. at 330pm we were again told that the room was still not ready but for our troubles we would be upgraded to a suitegreat the american hospitality shown to us throughout california was the same herewrong again we arrived in our room to find it was the exact same room we had paid for so we had been lied to twice within two hours of arrival. the room was basically what you would expect from a travelodge or holiday inn with a tv in the bathroom mirror which was obscured by the tapwe recieved no turn down service al this could have been ignored but night time is when the niko shows its true colours on the way out of the lift me and my girlfreind were approached by a hooker asking if i wanted to f ck her big black tit s i politely declinedon leaving the hotel we were greeted by a host of oaklands finest due to the shop over the road this place is a mecca for tramps pros and drug dealers we quickly got a cab to a better part of town the wharfon return to the hotel i asked if they had a smoking area as i did nt feel safe at the front of the hotel this was greeted with a look of disgust and a stern noso i decided to risk it. in the time it took me to smoke a cigarette i was spat on threatened and offered everything imaginable after this a drink was in order and guess what the bar was shut at 130pm on departure from the hotel i complained about the lies given to us about our room to the manager to be told what do you want me to do about it i said well the 57 dollar parking fee would be a start this was met with laughter and yet another no. so to round it all up if you want to pay 387total to have a bar that s never open snotty unhelpful staff hookers working in the hotel crackheads and drug dealers on your doorstop the hotel niko is a dream come true.

A fantastic honeymoon. The beds were amazingly comfortable. Everything was clean the room was an average size the facilities were great. Definitely pay the extra to use the health club you can also fill up water bottles from their water cooler which will save you money. you will need to. We were on the 14th floor and found the free wifi to be adequate on my phone which is not the best. for calling on what is ap checking emails and a few other websites I imagine it would be difficult to use it to watch filmsIt is incredibly expensive in central San Francisco and so although the hotel is really nice indoor pool is worth the extra 25 a room. it is not the luxury that you had expect for the price. Also the staff got a couple of details wrong ie we asked for a late check out and were told 50 till 1 pm only to be told when checking out at 1 pm it should have been 12 pm and there was no note made. We were also told that we had had water from the mini bar as a bottle was found on the flor not true. Both charges were removed from our bill so at least it was dealt with but really it should not have been a problem in the first place again the price meant I do not expect to have issues like that.

Although the room was beautiful there were a few issues that would cause me not to stay in the future. First there were no drawers or dresser to put clothes except a single drawer in the nightstand that was not enough. Second there were no hooks in the bathroom for the robes and towels. There is plenty of space to put hooks on the wall opposite the shower toilet. Third my wife moved the make up mirror over to the toilet so she had somewhere to sit while putting on her makeup. But there was no plug near the toilet so she could not plug it in. Fourth there was no desk. All of the above are important to us and can be found in other hotels in the area at the same price.

I loved everything about this hotel. My flight was delayed and I had a horrible headache I called them on my way to see if I could get some aspirin and they had it waiting for me in my room. I had every amenity I could ask for soft robe slippers tons of towels toiletries everything. Loved it.

Lovely haven in San Francisco. We stayed in the hotel in two separate occasions the first stay was for 2 nights where we stayed in Deluxe King room and the second one was for 3 nights as we checked out in between to go to Yosemite. The hotel is very well located in Union Square it is clean beautifully decorated with a touch of Japanese design. Check in process was seamless and smooth the newly renovated room is beautiful and modern although I do feel that the design of the bathroom for the Deluxe King could do with a bit of retouching. it looks a bit outdated not really matching the room design. Amenities in the bathroom were great and the room was always spotless. Although an ice machine was near to our room the room was pretty much soundproofed and we had great sleep. the view from the room was also beautiful not to mention the bed itself which was very comfortable. We ordered in room breakfast for the first two nights of our stay as breakfast did not come with the room rate and the Niko Breakfast was delicious and always beautifully presented. Unfortunately an incident happened right before we checked out during our first stay involving a front desk individual which I rightly complained to the Manager for but I was glad that it was handled so professionally she really took it seriously and it suggested to us how much the hotel overall really wants to value their guests. The manager sent us a personal letter champagne upgraded us to Imperial Club when we came back for the second occasion for 3 nights stay. the room was similar to the previous stay but the bathroom was gorgeous and there was a vanity area too. We also received a welcome back letter which I thought was a really nice touch. What really impressed us was the restaurant the breakfast at Anzu was delicious both Western and Japanese types and the service from every single staff in there was so professional polite and really made our day eg asking us for other orders such as pancakes which were not in the buffet. Having been to Japan a few times myself I thought the Japanese breakfast was delicious. We thought the touch of calling each and every guest with their surnames was really good and definitely does not happen in every hotel the service was so good that we even added tips even when breakfast was included in the room rate. The fitness club swimming pool and steam room were all clean and great. Overall we are really happy with our stay and will certainly make Niko our home again when we are back to San Francisco perhaps next year.

Brilliant. Clean tidy and gorgeous decor and great location. Rooms reasonably priced and a lovely dinner in your restaurant. Thanks so much for holding our bags and letting us use your facilities to shower and refresh as we were not flying out till late. Would recommend your Hotel to family and friends.
Good location close union squareThe hall of the hotel is marbleSmal rooms.

Courteous helpful staff especially in the Anzu would stay again with special offers. Location staff and spacious room. Upgraded to take advantage of the lounge and found it ’s offerings on the skimpy side compared to others. Union square at night can be rough but that ’s certainly no reflection on the hotel.

Very good hotel. 5mn walk to Union Square it is a nice hotel with a relaxing swimming pool. The staff is great and helpful we had a very nice view on San Francisco. The only thing is it is not very close to the part of San Francisco I prefer. peer 39 area and it takes 45 mn to walk there everyday because when we stayed in San Francisco and spend 3 or 4 hours in Union Square it was enough but everyday we went back to peer 39 area.
Good. Early check in is an extra and I do n’t like it. Rooms and services are good. Location is decent. Extra charge for early check in.
Exceptional. Staff was friendly hotel is very nice rooms are great early check in was awesome close to union square.
Exceptional. Beautiful hotel and rooms were really nice location is perfect. Unfortunately our room service order was incorrect we were delivered someone elses food.

Who charges to use the pool. Overall the hotel was decent and our room was very clean and nice. However to charge us to use the pool was ridiculous. After spending all that money for a room and parking to pylon a fee to use the pool was ridiculous. I ’ve never experienced that in my life.

I love this place. Staff is really friendly. Because we were there for our anniversary we got some free drinks with dinner and a special anniversary desert. Staff is very friendly and willing to go the extra mile. Hotel is really nice. Beds are comfortable nice water pressure in shower with multiple options neat housekeeping stunning views from the 21st floor. Valet service is 65 dollars a day like other hotels in area. There is another garage across the street but you are not in the best part in town and the garage is not amazing. it had be a bet on your part. On demand movies unfortunately both expensive and not working properly glitched quite a few times. Restaurant is amazing.

Perfect location but small room. Location of the hotel is perfect probably 3 minutes walk from “ Powell Station ”. Hotel looks fairly new. However the room is so small that the coffee machine had to be put in the toilet. They basically charged you for everything. We tried to check in at 12 pm and was told that there is a 30 early check in fee. Not sure if this is a common practice in sfo. but I do n’t understand why do you have to charge your guest for early check in when you already have vacant rooms available. There is also a fee for using their facilities premium high speed internet usage of facilities 2 tiny bottle of water daily welcome gift and a 10 dining credit per night. We stayed there for 4 nights and did n’t request for housekeeping throughout. However they did not provide us with the 2 x tiny bottle of water daily. They put a dog soft toy on our bed and we thought that is our welcome gift. But no they charge 28 for the soft toy. Hence please do not take the dog soft toy if you do not want to be charge unknowingly. Overall stay is fine if you are looking for a modern and new hotel this is the right hotel for you.
